title: Paraguay - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Paraguay stands at BB with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Paraguay was last set at Ba1 with positive outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Paraguay was last reported at BB+ with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Paraguay thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Paraguay as reported by major credit rating agencies.
